#include <iostream>
typedef long long int ll;
ll k=2147483647;
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll t,m,n,i,j,count;
	cin>>t;	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>m>>n;
	ll dp[m+1][n+1];
	for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
		{
			dp[i][j]=k;
		}
	}
	
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			cin>>dp[i][j];
		}
	}
	
	
	i=0,j=0,count=0;
	while(1)
	{
		if(dp[i+1][j]==dp[i][j+1])
		break;
		
		if(dp[i+1][j]<dp[i][j+1])
		i++;
		
		else
		j++;
		
		count++;
		
	}
	
	cout<<count<<"\n";
}
	return 0;
}
